KitKat::
She looked at War and nodded.  He made sence. She would have to take 
some time off away from them and sort things out on her own. But not 
now. Now she had a wat to focus on and her pack to help survive this 
whole mess.  She sighed and looked at War. "I thank you with all my 
spark for your council on this matter."  She turned and walked out of 
the lab.  She stood just outside the door way and looked at the 
wall.  She was very confused and getting scared.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  War saw her face. "Do not think of this as a bad thing. Do what 
you want. 
> Just bec drillbit proposed first does not mean a thing. Destructor 
was not 
> around then. So how will you ever know. But all I can do is tell 
you this. 
> Think of who makes you happy. Who you can see as your protector 
your love and 
> your life. I know i cant help you make this desicion. No one can 
help you. I 
> suggest you take some time away from both of them and think. Do not 
tell 
> drillbit yet of what has happened for I fear what he may do. I 
leave you know 
> to protecte destructor. I owe him that much. He is the noblest bot 
I have 
> ever meet." He walked away and stood infront of the cr holding 
destructor 
> standing guard.
